body_html:
ah, need to fix that comment: the -gencode need to change too so nvcc generates the 3.0 code. That explains why tensorflow took the card but returned zeros. The correct change is here:
669b2cc#diff-1d799fa350437420218e5e5aa680c481
body_text:
ah, need to fix that comment: the -gencode need to change too so nvcc generates the 3.0 code.  That explains why tensorflow took the card but returned zeros. The correct change is here:
669b2cc#diff-1d799fa350437420218e5e5aa680c481
body:
ah, need to fix that comment: the -gencode need to change too so nvcc generates the 3.0 code.  That explains why tensorflow took the card but returned zeros. The correct change is here:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/669b2cc9fa02527c87e9f82bd4ac7d76e715d2a8#diff-1d799fa350437420218e5e5aa680c481
